Auckland cyclist spins through air after collision, confronts pensioner driver at home https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-cyclist-spins-pins-though-air-air-air-air-after-collision-collision-confronts-pensioner-driver-driver-driver-athome/lkfqeb24pzgdfc7443ot5lcux4y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-cyclist-spins-pins-though-air-air-air-air-after-collision-collision-confronts-pensioner-driver-driver-driver-athome/lkfqeb24pzgdfc7443ot5lcux4y/ Cherie Howie‘How the hell?’, grandmother says after cyclist told her to pay $12,000 in bike repairs. Thu, 30 Jan 2025 16:00:00 +0000 A fellow rider's helmet-cam captures a cyclist tumbling 180 degrees over his handlebars after being allegedly cut-off by the driver of an SUV during a New Year's Day bike ride. The cyclist is now demanding the driver pay $12,000 in repairs to the uninsured custom-built bike.
